name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Readwok: split and read in pieces

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Break the text and read it incrementally in small portions. Improve your reading comprehension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yet another one distraction-free reader with a progressive viewing mode. The common use case is to make a wall of unformatted text more readable. The quality of text splitting depends on the source.

This reader supports 4 reading modes:
- single paragraph
- current + previous paragraphs
- progressive scroll mode
- all paragraphs
